title: Textile

Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: plain compound cloth, brocaded
description: Faded blue ground with design of large vertical zigzags outlined by minute ornaments in silver thread and containing a large variety of flower forms brocaded in polychrome silks.  The zigzags are interrupted by undulating branches brocaded in silver thread.
